channel.title: I CANT MAKE MY COMPILER TO WORK [IMPOSSIBLE TASK] Matrix base
channel.description:
okey guys. Look this:
[size=12pt]I HAVE SET THE F*CKING VARIABLES![/size]
there is no way to make my compiler work.
this is what it contains: @echo off @title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7" *.java pause exit
the error i get is the following: "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7" is not recognized as an internal or external command.
I have jdk1.7.0_05, jre6 and jre7 downloaded, help me.

item.title: I CANT MAKE MY COMPILER TO WORK [IMPOSSIBLE TASK] Matrix base
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try this:

[code]@echo off
:menu
title Compiler

echo Errors:
echo
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit [/code]

Read full topic
item.source: I CANT MAKE MY COMPILER TO WORK [IMPOSSIBLE TASK] Matrix base

item.title: I CANT MAKE MY COMPILER TO WORK [IMPOSSIBLE TASK] Matrix base
item.dc:creator: @Belob0g Belob0g
item.description:
@Belob0g wrote:

[quote=“RemiM, post:2, topic:452706”]If you have variables set, then this should work:

@echo off @title Compiler javac *.java pause exit[/quote]
now it gives me another error:

javac file not found:*java
usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue…
